Patients stratify accord response prior therapy ( relapse vs refractory ) , prior autologous stem cell transplantation ( yes v ) , number prior therapy regimen ( 1-2 v 3-6 ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . Arm I - Induction : Patients receive oblimersen ( G3139 ) IV continuously day 1-7 15-21 oral dexamethasone daily day 4-7 , 11-14 , 18-21 . - Maintenance : One week completion induction therapy , patient stable responsive disease receive G3139 IV continuously day 1-7 oral dexamethasone daily day 4-7 .
